mapper.select: select ask_no, it.pro_no, ask_type, ask_content, id_no, ask_date, upask_no, a.nickname , a.pimage, a.idtype from itemask ask left outer join item it on ask.pro_no=it.pro_no left outer join account a on ask.id_no = a.ano where it.pro_no = #{pro_no} order by upask_no desc, ask_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into itemask (ask_no, pro_no, ask_type, ask_content, id_no, ask_date, upask_no) values(seq_ask.nextval,#{pro_no},'댓글',#{acontent},#{id_no}, sysdate, seq_ask.currval)
insert into itemask (ask_no, pro_no, ask_type, ask_content, id_no, ask_date, upask_no) values(seq_ask.nextval,#{pro_no},'답글',#{acontent},#{id_no}, sysdate, #{upask_no})
